title: If there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed.
description: When there is no data available for a series in the chart, a user-friendly error message should be shown to inform the user.
OB: When there is no data available for a series, the chart does not display a friendly error message.
EB: When there is no data available for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed to inform the user.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a chart. 2. Set the data definition. 3. Select a column without any data.
